newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Magnum says large crossing internal.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Magnum says large crossing internal.

text.p: Gold and minerals explorer Magnum Gold NL said on Wednesday a crossing of about 12 million shares on market earlier in the dya was a transfer from holding company to a subsidiary company in the same group.

"There has been no change to the substantial shareholders in the company," the company said in a statement. Magnum shares jumped four cents or 100 percent to eight cents on light volume shortly after the trade took place earlier this morning.
Dealers said broker Dicksons put through the parcel of 12.04 million shares at a price of 4.3 cents each. At 3.10 p.m. (0410 GMT) Magnum shares were 3.9 cents firmer at 7.9 cents.
